about_the_game:
I am OK is a story-driven 2D adventure game about a young woman's journey through her traumatic past. It deals with mental health, thematizes its stigma in society and centers around one of the strongest human emotions: anger.

Sometimes it's okay to not be okay.


Immerse yourself in the captivating tale of Neera, who has maintained an emotional barrier throughout her entire life. But now, recurring nightmares shatter her inner defenses, throwing her world into disarray—from her career and studies to her personal life. Involuntarily, she returns to an unloved place she once left behind: her childhood home.

Embark on an extraordinary journey of self-discovery with I am OK, where the powerful human emotion of anger takes center stage. Explore the hidden fragments of Neera's past, delving into unique visual impressions and a world that evokes both relief and fury.



Are you ready to accompany Neera on this intense expedition, uncovering the secrets of her past and rediscovering her inner equilibrium?

Key Features


  • A thrilling storyline: Dive into a rich and deep narrative
  • A multi-layered female main character: Uncover ‎what Neera has buried deep within her and discover the truth about her past
  • Unique characters, such as shadow creatures (and a cat!)
  • Bizarre dream worlds: Experience the intertwining of Neera's reality and her memories
  • Room-changing puzzles that influence the gameplay
  • Decision-making: Take influence on the course of the game
  • Handling anger as a game element: you decide on the use of anger
  • Hand-drawn graphics in 4K/UHD and charming frame-by-frame animations

Face past experiences


Neera's journey takes her through her memories, revealing secrets and delving into deeply buried thoughts. Along the way, she encounters her inner self, Eris, an untamed force of pure emotion. Each memory and emotional outburst brings her closer to her childhood trauma, unlocking the Pandora's box. Surprisingly, her world gains color with every step.

"I am OK" is an impressive tale of self-discovery, exploring the power of emotions.

name: I am OK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Join the talented photography student Neera on a captivating journey through her memories. Haunted by recurring nightmares, her life spirals into chaos, questioning everything. Involuntarily, she returns to a place she once left behind: her childhood home.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
